title: Delhi Mundka Fire Live Updates: Six out of 27 bodies identified; CM Kejriwal announces Rs 10 lakh ex-gratia for kin of deceased - The Indian Express
content:
1. Delhi Mundka Fire Live Updates: Six out of 27 bodies identified; CM Kejriwal announces Rs 10 lakh ex-gratia for kin of deceased  The Indian Express

description: Delhi Mundka Fire News Today Live Updates 14 May, Delhi Fire News: The Delhi Police has arrested the owners of Cofe Impex Pvt Ltd, which manufactures CCTV cameras, since it was the office of Cofe Impex where the fire broke out.
